name: Prospective
description: Prospective (PROS) is the native token powering the ProsVenture NFT ecosystem, where blockchain, storytelling, and real-world utility converge. PROS is used for trading, staking, and marketplace interactions, while also enabling innovative NFT mechanics such as upgrades, modifications, and real-world product pairing. Through comics, collectibles, and DeFi integration, Pros bridges culture, creativity, and finance.
